name: SearchStripePaymentIntents
description:
Search previously created Stripe PaymentIntents.

Use this tool to search for PaymentIntents that you have previously created on Stripe using their Search Query Language. Note that search results might be slightly delayed, so avoid using this tool in scenarios needing strict consistency immediately after data changes.

parameters.name: search_query_string
parameters.description: The search query to find specific PaymentIntents using Stripe's Search Query Language. Refer to the documentation for query syntax and fields.

value_schema.description: The search query string. See [search query language](https://stripe.com/docs/search#search-query-language) and the list of supported [query fields for payment intents](https://stripe.com/docs/search#query-fields-for-payment-intents).

parameters.name: expand_fields
parameters.description: A list of specific fields in the response that should be expanded. Use field names as strings.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: result_limit
parameters.description: Number of PaymentIntent objects to return, ranging from 1 to 100, with a default of 10.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination. Use the 'next_page' value from a previous response to request more results.

value_schema.description: A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. Don't include this parameter on the first call. Use the next_page value returned in a previous response to request subsequent results.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Stripe API.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. Don't include this parameter on the first call. Use the next_page value returned in a previous response to request subsequent results.

value_schema.description: A cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. Don't include this parameter on the first call. Use the next_page value returned in a previous response to request subsequent results.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The search query string. See [search query language](https://stripe.com/docs/search#search-query-language) and the list of supported [query fields for payment intents](https://stripe.com/docs/search#query-fields-for-payment-intents).

value_schema.description: The search query string. See [search query language](https://stripe.com/docs/search#search-query-language) and the list of supported [query fields for payment intents](https://stripe.com/docs/search#query-fields-for-payment-intents).
